name: Gradius Collection
description: Gradius Collection is a compilation of five beloved games in the Gradius series available for the first time on the PSPÂ® system. Spanning more than 20 years, the five games Gradius, Gradius II, Gradius III, Gradius IV, and the long awaited Gradius Gaiden (never before released in the U.S.), deliver hours of classic 2D shooting action on the go.
